      • modifyDescription

        @RequestMapping(value="/modifyDescription",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public void modifyDescription(@RequestParam(value="class_id")
                                                                                                                         long classId,
                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="description")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                                                                                  throws java.io.IOException
        处理修改班级描述请求
        参数:
        classId - 班级ID
        session - Session实体
        description - 新的班级描述
        response - HTTP响应实体
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - IO处理异常
